creator: zhihong@gmail.com
text: Many OpenSSL options are not supported by the native HTTPS connector. For example, SSLCADNRequestFile is not supported. Should support all the parameters used by Apache httpd mod_ssl.
This is now possible via the support for the OpenSSl SSL_CONF API added in 9.0.0.M27 onwards and 8.5.21 onwards.
creator: markt@apache.org
